abstrac: My concern is to have hapy clients. Quality defines my services.
bio: Creating great web 2.0, clean and beautiful websites, UI/UX for websites and apps , print design (bussines cards, brochures, logos, letterheads, etc.), retouching images and many other ”design”  activities are part of my life.     My name Andrei Sebastian.  I am a graphic designer.   My first concern is to have happy clients. I can obtain this only by delivering a high quality work.     I have a big advantage:     I like what i do!!!     I started to work with Photoshop 4 years ago. I started with picture retouching and later i discovered that i can do more interesting things with Photoshop, not just changing the eyecolor of a friend photo and other simple things like that.     Now i started to learn Html, Css and all the other programing languages, in order to create full sites, no just  interfaces.     Contact me and you will not be disapointed!!!

description.title: Database Expert (SqlServer,Oracle)
description:
Expert,Consultant,Migration, Cluster :SQL DBA/Developer

More than 8 years of professional work experience in IT, especially in SQL Server DBA & Development (T-SQL Programming). During my career I wor…

bio:
More than 8 years of professional work experience in IT, especially in SQL Server DBA. During my career I worked with both in India and the UK for US and UK based clients, mostly working with SQL Server Technology – right from version 7.0 to its latest form. I worked on cluster environments, performance tuning and optimization projects for high transactional systems and migration projects with size of more than 10TB. 

I have received my Master of Computer Application from the Osmania University Hyderabad, Andhra Pradesh, India. 

Specialties:- 

All version SQLDBA Production support.
SQL Server Performance Tuning.
Database Mirroring & Log Shipping, AlwaysON ( DR & HA)
SQL Version upgrade, Site migration. 
SQL Profiler, Query Execution plan, Indexing.
SQL Server Disaster Recovery Setup.
SQL Server HADR, AlwaysOn, Replication, Availability Group, Logshipping.
SQL Server Clustering, Replication.
SQL Server Capacity Planning, Consolidation & Virtualization.

commnet: I have used MorethanGraphite on many occasions for professional real estate renderings. Each time he has produced a great rendering that has increased our ability to market the product and give buyers an idea of what their future beautiful home will look like.

Mark did a fantastic job! He is very easy to work with, designed exactly as I requested, made multiple iterations without a hint of complaining and left me plenty of time to review the work without pushing me to wrap it up. A great guru!

I have hired Mark to do some 3D renderings of some homes I am building and I have already hired him to do some additional 3D renderings. I have enjoyed working with him and plan on continuing to do so.
S K KEDDY PTY LTD · Sep 09, 2012
Mark was prompt and proffesional with his work ,I am very satisfied and would be happy to reccomend his work to anyone. Thanks Mark.

Great quality work, on time and on budget. Very good communications. We are extremely pleased with Mark's work and will not hesitate to use him again. We are pleased to give him a very high recommendation!

abstrac: Business Management, Operations, Supply Chain, Manufacturing, and Inventory Control
bio:
I am all about simple business fundamentals.  I find business creative and interesting and when business is done well. 

I have managed several manufacturing plants ranging in size from 1 million pounds a year to a facility that did 25 million pounds a year/

I have built plants, moved plants, and shut down plants.

I was a business manager for high purity chemicals, a business that did 6 million a year, US, and manged customers, manufacturing, and shipping of product to Malaysia, Philippines, and Singapore.

I have been trained in Lean manufacturing, Six Sigma, Dale Carnegie Sales, and I have an MBA .

I created and ran a used book service through eBay, Amazon, and online.

I have websites running today, darylburnett.com, everyoneisabuddha.com., and indestructible muscle.com.

I know business online and off, and I like to learn new business and make them better.

I learn fast, read constantly,  

It is what I do.

I am just a simple guy, who is interested in way too m

I am interested in learning and working on as many projects as I and helping you grow your business. I make money by making you money

Contact by email is the best, but  whatever is easiest for you.

bio:
WHO WE ARE

UFours is a Product Development and Enterprise IT services company focused on Software as a Service systems and Mobility and Collaboration solutions.

We provide a broad range of services needed to take a software product from concept to the market place. We also provide Enterprise IT Services including Systems Integration and Business Intelligence solutions development.

We backup all our services with high quality, reliable Technical Support.

UFours extremely low attrition rates directly result in a consistently high level of service over time, creating value for customers. Our transparent, customized processes for each project and close integration with customer teams reduce risk and cut time to market.

Work Terms:
-----------------
Generally, we are working on Monday to Saturday from 9:30 AM - 7:30 PM IST. If client prefers to work on his/her time, then will make the arrangements based on the their request.

Payment Terms:
----------------------
We will have the payment terms of creating milestones of the work before start the work. If client has different payment terms, we will negotiate based on their request.

Communication Terms:
-------------------------------
Usually, we will available to communicate 24/7/365 via Skype. And, we will have e-mail communicate as well.

abstrac: Digital Agency with a creative difference
bio: We are web based firm, located in the hub of IT-sector (I.T Park) in Chandigarh, India. We started in early 2004, for a reason. We observed that there weren’t many companies around at that time, which offered quality designing solutions to their clients. Designs that were produced were no where close to the standard and class of International level. And we wanted to change that. We challenged the conventional perceptions, and delivered innovative solutions that embarked our brand name in International markets. From a one man vision, to 70 plus strong brigade of skilled, experienced, passionate, desiring, creative and dedicated team members, all under one roof are called Miracle Studios.We started with designing, but today we have extended our services in all the fields. We design, develop, market and produce all kinds of web solutions, using all the current and advance formats. We have a separate and a well established studio for animation and designs, to create and spark some in
We work hourly and fixed price projects. In addition to that we are comfortable working as per the client payment preferences.

abstrac: Speed, efficiency and integrity. You wont be disappointed!
bio: I'm a highly experienced software engineer with a wide range of skills. I have worked with a range of different technologies and tools, from console and embedded software to desktop applications and 2D games for Windows and *nixes, as well as building websites and web applications for some of the largest websites in the world, such as www.bodybuilding.com and www.lan.com.

For fixed price projects I require to sign a project agreement and any changes requested after requirements have been signed off on would need to be renegotiated accordingly. Payments for fixed price projects are expected to be done in two parts, half of the total amount at the start, and the rest upon completion of the project. If using "escrow" then the payments can be done when the project is completed (this is the preferred way for first time projects). For hourly rate projects a weekly or bi weekly payment model is preferable.

abstrac: Web Developer, Web Designer, Information Architecture, and WordPress
bio:
The combination of a B.S. in Computer Science and an MLIS (Masters of Library and Information Science), give me a solid background as a metadata specialist, information architect, web developer, and digital librarian. I have 14 years of work experience, most recently seven years at bibliographic database provider EBSCO publishing. My role has often included acting as "translator" between technical and non-technical people, and clear documentation is one of my strong points.

I built the custom theme for my personal blog at http://www.westofwonder.com, if you want to see an example of my work.
